greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1 / (1 + x - x^3) in powers of x.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,0,1).
formula: 0 = a(n) - a(n+2) - a(n+3) for all n in Z.
a(-n) = A000931(n) for all n in Z.
a(n) = A176971(n+3) for all n in Z.
-a(n) = A104769(n+1) for all n in Z.
(-1)^n * a(n) = A050935(n+3) for all n in Z.
-(-1)^n * a(n) = A078013(n+3) for all n in Z.
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 + x - x^3), {x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 27 2014 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, n = -3-n; polcoeff( 1 / (1 - x^2 - x^3) + x * O(x^n), n), polcoeff( 1 / (1 + x - x^3) + x * O(x^n), n))};
(MAGMA) m:=60; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/(1 + x - x^3)));  // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 04 2018
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Sep 26 2014
